tweets.text:
The recent heavy rain was a good opportunity to check on 1 of last year's river restoration projects. Designed to let the floodwater connect to its floodplain - fair to say, its working! 
Nice project with @EnvAgencyNW @EdenRiversTrust @ollyolly092 @WoodlandTrust @herdyshepherd1 https://t.co/aCdQIt6DZ3

Please RT: trailers of waste have been found abandoned across the country, putting the environment at risk.

The Joint Unit for Waste Crime is investigating this.

If you've seen anything, contact Crimestoppers anonymously or call 0800 807060. https://t.co/mNMYwK0bd9

‚õîÔ∏èHundred Foot Bank #LittleDownham is CLOSED due to flooding.

Please use an alternative route.

@EnvAgencyAnglia
#Flood https://t.co/WhjkVIS1ZH

We have issued a new flood warning for #Pooleharbour and have warnings in place for tomorrow morning‚Äôs high tide in Devon & Cornwall. Check if you‚Äôre at risk https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15 https://t.co/jyJd0YdEho
We have issued flood warnings along the south coast of #Devon and #Cornwall for tomorrow morning's high tide.  Find out if you're at risk and how to prepare: https://t.co/QdPKdFg7SD
@LeaderSomerInds @EnvAgencySW @BristolAvonRT @DJWarburton @EnvAgency And the incessant tanker movements. Friends in N Dorset sick of lanes constantly bogged up with the vehicles.

tweets.text: Another very slow üëèüëèüèªüëèüèºüëèüèΩüëèüèæüëèüèø for @kersten_england @SHinchcliffe @bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency for putting a nail in #keighley & #AireValley's ‚ö∞Ô∏è we're not giving up yet. #saltaire #shipley #bingley #baildon #ilkley #ilkley #silsden #steeton #bradord #clearair #toxicair https://t.co/j9AUxfXSWt

Came across this the other day. The Fishing in Wales website of 1976! A great read. A lot has changed. 6000 salmon caught annually on the Wye! No mention of grayling whatsoever, or now common sea species such as rays & hounds. Upland llyn fishing similar though. #fishinginwales https://t.co/ccm6gOzp8U

tweets.text: We've made temporary repairs to the flood defences at #Newland, near #Selby on the lower River #Aire, to ensure they are strengthened for winter. We'll be starting work to build a new #flood defence wall here next year: https://t.co/L4RRGXVy4k https://t.co/pQbVhmQZay

@ThamesPathNT @EnvAgencySE @thames_walk May well be runoff contributing but surprised EA levels aren‚Äôt listed higher. Levels certainly rose in Waterhay Reedbeds overnight. @andyrumming may have a more ‚Äòon the spot‚Äô update. Got the kayak out again yet Andy?

tweets.text:
Thames Path today between Hailstone and North Meadow. Completely impassable. Probably 4 feet deep and flowing fast. Alternative route using cycle route 45 advised.
@ThamesPathNT https://t.co/nLDQKaRtv9

Recent slurry spreading on same farm as last year. On waterlogged ground. Reported last year  to the @EnvAgencySW and I will report again. But what's the point? Ditch system connects to the river close by.  @BristolAvonRT @DJWarburton https://t.co/7XzhG2t69d

tweets.text:
Essential maintenance work continues at Day's Lock. 
Tail gates out and in the compound next to the Lock. New tail gates waiting for 'paddles' to be fitted before they're lowered into place. 
Stormy #sunset it'll be wet #Wednesday üåßÔ∏è‚òîÔ∏è
@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @RiverThames https://t.co/BDHIFI7Xve

tweets.text: Industry then has a fixed period of time to establish a task & finish group to work with @EnvAgency to revise. If group not set up in time, QP lapses. 3 QPs currently awaiting T&F group (deadline 30 May 2021) - #digestate, #compost and #PoultryLitterAsh. 2/3

New publication by @EnvAgency on its work to review #QualityProtocols (QPs) for #EndOfWaste. Sets out process whereby EA will look at existing QPs and decide if they need revising. 1/3
https://t.co/kHP3YMyHmS

üö®LAST WEEK TO HAVE YOUR SAY!üö®

Our consultation on proposals for flood defences for the River Avon closes on Sunday 20 Dec. 

Read more about how we and @EnvAgency plan to tackle flooding in the thread below, then head over to https://t.co/2CBgO04K9Y to complete the survey ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/jsFZOs4avg

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency report trailers of waste have been found abandoned across the country, putting the environment at risk.

The Joint Unit for Waste Crime is investigating this.

If you've seen anything, contact Crimestoppers anonymously or call 0800 807060. https://t.co/tJ8SgPuUP9

Combining flood defences & nature is snow good! 

#DYK Salford flood storage reservoir completed in 2018 holds more than 250 Olympic-sized swimming pools‚Äô of water & its embankments are covered in wildflower habitat to attract pollinators

Find out more ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/RuiHRTlCxM https://t.co/ypM5omx10N

It's little things that make our collective efforts worthwhile.
Spur us on to achieve more.
An Otter in the Irwell at Adelphi in the centre of Salford
HOW AMAZING IS THAT
@salford_mayor @salforduni @SalfordVRangers @natural_course @EnvAgencyNW @MarkSewellUU @GroundworkGM https://t.co/zOfdnhY7DJ

We are THRILLED to have won four different awards alongside our partners at @esh_group @Stantec @NTCouncilTeam & @EnvAgency for our improvement work in North Tyneside üëè

A huge thanks to our partners - WELL DONE GUYS! üèÜ

Read more - https://t.co/OWzTFwArcm https://t.co/yN8q6zcMwI

@suesustainable @EnvAgencySW @BristolAvonRT @DJWarburton @EnvAgency And it is not just slurry going on our fields, but digestate from local Anaerobic Digester plants - many of which are not proprely regulated or run. What effects do digestates have on human health, animal health or soil fertility? From what I have seen, there is not enough study.

tweets.text: A productive morning spent getting the daily rainfall observer packs ready for posting, here are just a few of them for Cumbria. Our observers are a dedicated group of volunteers taking measurements every day. @CumbriaRain @metoffice @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/DTM49sr6Lf

Almost five years ago, thousands of homes were flooded during #StormEva. This is just some of what we have done to protect communities since. 

Make sure you're prepared for any #flooding this winter. Check your risk and make a plan üëâ https://t.co/kEo9reCpQy #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Qchyf28hHK

You have until 31 January to have your say!

https://t.co/JhorCRqbSm
